TimeSensitiveLogic.DailyLimitReset: underLimit checks if current day differs from m_lastDay to reset m_spentToday.
TimeSensitiveLogic.TransactionRelevance: Transactions exceeding the daily limit are held for multi-signature approval and may be time-sensitive depending on spending needs.

ConditionalLogicPaths.MultiSignatureDecision: Path depends on whether the transaction value exceeds the daily limit, triggering multi-signature requirements.
ConditionalLogicPaths.OwnerValidation: All critical functions check if the msg.sender is a registered owner before proceeding.
